basics.label: Finance Office Associate
basics.summary: Detail-oriented, diligent and accuracy-driven individual with a B.sc in accounting and Ms./MBA degree in finance. In the past years, gained vast experience/skills in office operations with top-notch handling of office communications, logistics and records. In the banking and accounting industry, focused on balancing customer needs and relations while ensuring bank security regulatory requirements and protection protocols.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed office operations including office communications, logistics, records, customer relations, banking regulatory requirements and protection protocols.
highlights: Managed over 30 vendors and reconciled invoices
Restocked supplies and placed purchase orders
Developed and maintained spreadsheets in Excel
Processed invoices and expenses using Oracle EBS
Completed clerical tasks such as filing, copying and distributing mail
Arranged rapid office equipment repair and maintenance with vendors

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed clerical duties, maintain files, and organize documents, photocopy.
highlights: Provided accurate information in person or by telephone to students, staff, and public applying knowledge of University programs, policies, and procedures.
Decreased office expenditure by 20% by implementing needed controls on stock/supplies and standardizing ordering procedures
Resolved interpersonal conflicts by listening, finding common ground and building relationships.

certificates.name: ICAN
certificates.issuer: Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria
